Intune Key Capabilities.title: Device Management Across Platforms
Intune Key Capabilities.description: Intune securely manages device enrollment across Android, iOS/iPad, macOS, and Windows, orchestrating registration, certificate installation, and access to internal resources.

Intune Key Capabilities.title: Application Management
Intune Key Capabilities.description: Intune enables access to corporate applications from any device, streamlining management and optimizing the digital workspace.

Intune Key Capabilities.title: Security and Compliance
Intune Key Capabilities.description: Microsoft Intune integrates with GDPR, HIPAA, and industry standards, providing data security features like loss prevention, encryption, and compliance monitoring.

Intune Endpoint Protection.title: Integration with Microsoft Defender Antivirus
Intune Endpoint Protection.description: Intune collaborates with Microsoft Defender for Endpoint, broadening its scope to offer comprehensive security solutions.

Intune Endpoint Protection.title: Threat Detection and Response
Intune Endpoint Protection.description: Intune employs threat intelligence and machine learning algorithms to identify and mitigate potential risks.

Intune Endpoint Protection.title: Collaboration and Productivity
Intune Endpoint Protection.description: Intune leverages Azure Active Directory for integration with various Microsoft 365 services. This integration enables automatic policy deployment based on user roles and groups.

Intune Workplace Management.title: Supporting Remote Work
Intune Workplace Management.description: Intune tackles this challenge by offering flexible device policies and an intuitive role-based access control (RBAC) model, enabling businesses to manage access privileges.

Intune Workplace Management.title: Corporate-Owned and BYOD Management
Intune Workplace Management.description: Intune's MDM and MAM capabilities guarantee regulatory compliance and smooth device functionality, enhancing user experiences while safeguarding organizational assets.

Intune Workplace Management.title: Self-Service Portals
Intune Workplace Management.description: Self-service portals have become indispensable tools, and Intune's cutting-edge offering, Microsoft Entra ID, is leading the way in revolutionizing user interaction.
